name: Cup o' Go | Go 1.20 is out! Also, new golangci-lint, new "full-stack" email server, and Conf42 virtual event CFP!
summary: The big news this week: Go 1.20 is out!Profile-guided optimization is herecontext.WithCancelCause is addedGo 1.18 is no longer supportedProposals this week:Accepted: A proposal to improve forward compatibility with go.modAccepted: A proposal to add a new stdlib package with map...
